mapper.select: SELECT id, start_date, end_date, currency, zone_id, account_type, account_no, main_status, special_commodity, price_form, start_weight, end_weight, price_published_id, is_published_price, aging, volume_divisor, inner_org_id FROM price_exp_main where id = #{id}

SELECT id, start_date, end_date, currency, zone_id, account_type, account_no, main_status, special_commodity, price_form, start_weight, end_weight, price_published_id, is_published_price, aging, volume_divisor, inner_org_id FROM price_exp_main where 1 = 1 order by id desc
